title.rendered: Ukrainian & Russian Expats In Dubai Call For Peace Between The Two Neighbouring Countries

content.rendered: Dubai: Two expats are hoping to take their message of love and peace from Dubai to Ukraine where attacks from Russia over the past week have left thousands dead and millions displaced.

excerpt.rendered:
Released by top Dubai business setup firm A&A Associate, this message is what the world desperately needs to understand right now.

Learn More
